question: ok well My son got his results back here are the resultsGAD-65 AB      > 30.0 HC-PEPTIDE          2.1ISLET CELL ANTIBODY  (NEG)His Glucose test wasFasting 931 HR PP 338 HGlucose PostPrandial 2 HR was 79The doctor sent me to a gastrologist who told me that my GP sent me to him for no reason. He cant find anything wrong except that my son is skinny because of Diabetes I was floored. He said see a Endocrinologist.Well I called my GP said to explain the results to me and he said well I have to do some research and am going to put a referal in to a Endocrinologist which can take weeks. He said he isnt familiar with juvenile diabetes so what do you think. Is my son Diabetic.
title: results are in
